page.title: 12History _ Leck area
page.content: {ROMANS}_ There is a Roman road through our block.The Roman General Agricola came north in 79A.D. to conquer a local tribe called Brigantes and so he built this road from Ribchester to Carlisle.There is a "Roman British Settlement"midway between Low House Farm (just off our block) and Collingholme Farm .Through a field gate to the left it is quite a large circular site,lots of stones showing through the ground as yet not excavated. {SHOPS AND PUBS}_ There were two Beer Houses the "Red Lion" which now is Temperance Farm and "The Black Bull" which now is Greystone Cottage and which also had a sweet shop in the front room. There was also a Blacksmith,a Cobbler,and the village shop.
